statements: SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory;
SELECT payment_id, premium_amount FROM PaymentHistory ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_id = 5;
SELECT premium_amount, payment_status FROM PaymentHistory WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM PaymentHistory WHERE premium_amount > 1000 ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_status FROM PaymentHistory WHERE premium_amount < 500 AND payment_status='Pending';
SELECT DISTINCT(premium_amount) FROM PaymentHistory WHERE renewal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY premium_amount ASC;
SELECT payment_id, premium_amount, renewal_date FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_status='Successful' ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_status, renewal_date FROM PaymentHistory WHERE payment_status='Failed' AND renewal_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_status FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_status='SUCCESS';
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM RenewalDates WHERE renewal_status='PENDING';
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, policy_id, renewal_date FROM RenewalDates ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM RenewalDates WHERE renewal_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_status = 'Completed' AND payment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_payment FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_payment > 5000;
SELECT policy_id, payment_date, amount, payment_status FROM PremiumPayments JOIN RenewalDates ON PremiumPayments.payment_id = RenewalDates.policy_id WHERE RenewalDates.renewal_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_status = 'Success';
SELECT policy_id, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT renewal_date, renewal_status FROM RenewalDates ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumPayments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_amount, r.renewal_date FROM PremiumPayments p JOIN RenewalDates r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id WHERE r.renewal_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY r.renewal_date DESC;

SELECT p.payment_id, r.renewal_date, ps.status FROM PremiumPayments p JOIN RenewalDates r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id JOIN PaymentStatus ps ON p.payment_id = ps.payment_id WHERE ps.status = 'Complete' ORDER BY r.renewal_date ASC;

SELECT p.payment_id, p.payment_amount, r.renewal_date, ps.status FROM PremiumPayments p JOIN RenewalDates r ON p.policy_id = r.policy_id JOIN PaymentStatus ps ON p.payment_id = ps.payment_id WHERE ps.status = 'Pending' ORDER BY p.payment_amount DESC, r.renewal_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_status FROM PremiumPayments;
SELECT user_id, payment_date FROM RenewalDates ORDER BY renewal_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, renewal_date FROM RenewalDates WHERE user_id = 101;
SELECT status_name FROM PaymentStatus WHERE status_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PremiumPayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, payment_date, amount FROM PremiumPayments WHERE amount > 1000 AND payment_status='PAID' ORDER BY payment_date ASC;

SELECT PremiumPayments.*, RenewalDates.renewal_date FROM PremiumPayments JOIN RenewalDates ON PremiumPayments.payment_id = RenewalDates.premium_payment_id WHERE RenewalDates.renewal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_payments FROM PremiumPayments GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_payments > 5 ORDER BY total_payments DESC;
SELECT PolicyLapses.user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_lapses FROM PolicyLapses GROUP BY PolicyLapses.user_id HAVING total_lapses >= 3 ORDER BY total_lapses ASC;
SELECT * FROM premium_payments ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT payment_amount, payment_date FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT policy_id, renewal_date FROM renewal_dates ORDER BY renewal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM payment_status WHERE status = 'PAID';
SELECT policy_id, action, action_date FROM policy_history WHERE action_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM premium_payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM premium_payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT policy_id, MAX(renewal_date) FROM renewal_dates GROUP BY policy_id HAVING COUNT(renewal_date) > 1;
SELECT p.history_id, p.action, p.action_date, l.lapse_date FROM policy_history p JOIN policy_lapses l ON p.policy_id = l.policy_id WHERE l.lapse_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT status_id, status, payment_amount FROM payment_status ps JOIN premium_payments pp ON ps.payment_id = pp.payment_id WHERE pp.payment_amount > 5000 ORDER BY payment_amount ASC, status DESC;
